Uses of Package
com.pingidentity.sources

  • Packages that use com.pingidentity.sources 
    Package Description
    com.pingidentity.access
    Provides access to various objects contained within the main PingFederate application and engine.
    com.pingidentity.sources
    Driver classes and interfaces not limited to any protocol.
  • Classes in com.pingidentity.sources used by com.pingidentity.access 
    Class and Description
    CustomDataSourceDriver
    This interface provides the methods necessary to successfully create a CustomDataSourceDriver.
  • Classes in com.pingidentity.sources used by com.pingidentity.sources 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurableDriver
    Base interface that consolidates common methods across the sources package.
    CustomDataSourceDriverException
    The exception thrown when one of the methods of the CustomDataSourceDriver interface fails.
    SourceDescriptor
    This class returns metadata describing a ConfigurableDriver to the PingFederate server.
